name: 360 Camera Tracking
credits:
Client, Insta360;
Creator, MAKE. ART. NOW.;
blurb: An experiment where I came up with a method of resolving camera movement through the use of a synced, Insta360 X4 360° witness camera. I used Syntheyes to track and solve the shot, and line the two cameras up in virtual space in Blender. Insta360 press release[https://www.insta360.com/blog/creator-stories/insta360-vfx-reality-capture.html]
